snippet: Charges against Pacific Gas and Electric were linked to a 2010 natural gas pipeline explosion that killed eight people in the San Francisco Bay Area.
abstract: Pacific Gas and Electric is charged with 12 federal felony counts involving safety violations linked to a 2010 natural gas pipeline explosion that killed eight people in the San Francisco Bay Area.
lead_paragraph: Charges against Pacific Gas and Electric were linked to a 2010 natural gas pipeline explosion that killed eight people in the San Francisco Bay Area.

headline.main: Pacific Gas and Electric Charged With 12 Felonies in Explosion
headline.print_headline: Utility Charged With 12 Felonies in Gas Explosion
